sent.orig: If you invert "I can", you have "can I".
sent.trans: 如果你把I can两词前后颠倒一下，就成了can I。

sent.orig: You should correct the small letter i to capital letter I.
sent.trans: 你应该把小写的i改为大写的I。

sent.orig: In "if I were you" the verb "were" is in the subjunctive.
sent.trans: 在“If I were you”中动词“were”是虚拟语气。

sent.orig: I didn't know what I had expected of him, and I had taken no chances with him, but now I found that I could relax a little.
sent.trans: 起初我摸不清他的底，因此对他一直存有戒心，而我现在可以放心一些了。
